TopicTitle: gameplay is more broken than ever with new patch

Articles.Content:
trying to do planes or ssto is a total mess, broken physics,  medium wings are bugged (pitch inversed)  and now the game can randomly crash in the VAB.

yay performance increased but this is still very unplayable, was very looking forward for first path to make it decently playable, but fixed stuff to break more stuff.

Edited March 17, 2023 by Ultimw
